message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for both of us. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm really interested in your product but $10,000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,500 is still too far below my asking price.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $9,500. This gives you a good deal while still allowing me to get a fair price for my product. Let me know if you're interested.
Alice,  $9,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $9,000. This is a fair price for both of us.  Let's make a deal!

Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best price, but $9,000 is still below what I need to make this deal worthwhile. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,250. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product. Let's make a deal now!
